NuGet.0002.description:
NuGet package upgrade is recommended for selected target framework.

Standard .NET packages are recommended to have versions matching version of .NET that project targets.

Some other packages also are known to work better for selected target frameworks.
NuGet.0002.label: NuGet package upgrade is recommended

Project.0001.description: Project file needs to be converted to SDK-style. Modern .NET framework projects require a change in the project file format and use SDK corresponding to project flavor and functionality.
Project.0001.label: Project file needs to be converted to SDK-style

links.title: Overview of porting from .NET Framework to .NET

Project.0002.description:
Project's target framework(s) needs to be changed to the new target framework that you selected for this upgrade.

During upgrade target framework will be adjusted to corresponding platform when applicable. In some cases project would result in multiple target frameworks after the upgrade if it was using features that now have their own platforms in modern .NET frameworks (windows, iOS, Android etc).
Project.0002.label: Project's target framework(s) needs to be changed

links.title: Overview of porting from .NET Framework to .NET

Api.0002.description: Some API that lived in older versions of .NET frameworks were moved to standalone NuGet packages that could be added to projects explicitly.
Api.0002.label: API available in NuGet package

NuGet.0001.description:
NuGet package is incompatible with selected target framework.

Package needs to be upgraded to a version supporting selected project target framework. If there no new package versions supporting new target framework, different package needs to be used and all code needs to be upgraded to new API.
NuGet.0001.label: NuGet package is incompatible

Api.0001.description: API does not exist in the selected version of .NET. See breaking changes documentation for alternative or replacement functionality.
Api.0001.label: API does not exist

NuGet.0003.description:
NuGet package functionality is included with framework reference.

Package needs to be removed.
NuGet.0003.label: NuGet package functionality is included with framework reference
